Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Harry!

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Are you alright?

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Just now. You?

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Wake up. Wake up Ronald!

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Honestly. Get dressed, and don't go back to sleep. Come on Ron! Your mother says breakfast's ready.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: What??

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Harry it's his mark.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: This is horrible, how can the ministry not know who conjured it. Isn't there any security or?

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: It's hurting again isn't it, your scar.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: You know Sirius will want to hear about this. What you saw at the world cup, and the dream.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Alastor Moody? The aura.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Three sir.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Because they are unforgivable. Use of any one of them will...

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Stop it! Can't you see it's bothering him, stop it!

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: There's a reason those curses are unforgivable, and to perform them in a classroom. I mean did you see Neville's face.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Neville?

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: It's not going to work.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: You see this? This is an age line. Dumbledore drew it himself.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: So a genius like Dumbledore couldn't possibly be fooled by something pathetically dimwitted such as an age potion.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Go on Harry. Harry for goodness sake.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: We've already been through enough people why don't you just go and do it yourself? Ughh. What do you want me to say again?

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Ronald would like me to tell you that Seamus told him that Dean was told by Parvati that Hagrid was looking for you.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Uhhh...

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Dean was told by Parvati that... Please don't ask me say it again. Hagrid's looking for you.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: I'm NOT an owl!

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Pssst! Harry? Is that you?

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: How are you feeling? OK? The key is to concentrate. After that you just have to...

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Oh um.. Sorry I'll just go.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Your wand harry! Your wand!

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Boys.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: (Reading a newspaper) Look at this! I can't believe it she's done it again. Miss Granger a plain but ambitious girl seems to be developing a taste for famous wizards. Her latest prey sources report is none other than the Bulgarian bon-bon Viktor Krum. No word yet on how Harry Potter's taking this latest emotional blow.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: They're not for Ginny they're for you! Dress robes.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: It might interest you to know that Neville's already got someone.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Oh well spotted.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: I won't be going alone because believe it or not someone's asked me. And I said yes.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: What?

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: No of course.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: She said yes??

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Hot isn't it? Viktor's gone to get drinks. Care to join us?

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: What's got your wand in a knot?

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: The enemy?? Who was it wanting his autograph? Besides, the whole point of the tournament is international magical cooperation, to make friends.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: How dare you! Besides I can take care of myself.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: What? What? That's what you think?

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: You know the solution then don't you.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Next time there's a ball pluck up the courage and ask me before somebody else does, and not as a last resort.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Where have you been? Nevermind! Off to bed both of you. Harry and Ron walk away.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Ron you spoil everything!

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Harry you told me you'd figured the egg out weeks ago. The task is two days from now.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: I wouldn't know, we didn't actually talk about the tournament. Actually we didn't really talk at all, Viktor's more of a physical being. I just mean he's not particularly... Mostly he watches me study. It's a bit annoying actually. You are trying to figure this egg out aren't you?

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: I mean these tasks are supposed to test you, in the most brutal way they're almost cruel. And um, I'm scared for you. You got by the dragon mostly on nerve, I'm not sure it's going to be enough this time.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Harry, tell me again.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: The black lake, that's obvious.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Again obvious, though I must admit potentially problematic

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Look Harry, we can do this. The three of us can figure it out.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: But sir, the second task is only hours away and...

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Harry!

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Are you alright? You must be freezing! Personally I think you behaved admirably.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Next to last.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Bye.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: No.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Everything's going to change now isn't it?

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Promise you'll write this summer. Both of you.

Speaker: HERMIONE
Conversation: Harry will won't you?
